data.name: 整备模组

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值全满时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>1.5%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>1.5%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值全满时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>2%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>2%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值全满时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>3%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>3%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>90%</color>时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>4%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>4%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>90%</color>时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>5%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>5%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>80%</color>时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>6%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>6%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 自身的耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>80%</color>时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>7%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>7%</color>

WithPassiveSkills.name: 整备模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects:
自身的耐久值百分比大于等于<color=#F74848>80%</color>时，伤害提升<color=#F74848>9%</color>，遭受伤害降低<color=#F74848>9%</color>；
行动开始时耐久值恢复<color=#F74848>8%</color>

data.introduce: 整备模组更关注于机兵的完整性，减少整体为应对攻击的预留性能，充分发挥其应有的能力，但这也使其在被动迎战时显得极为乏力。
